DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine optimal dose botulinum toxin type A injected detrusor muscle improve urinary symptom , urodynamic parameter quality life continent woman suffer idiopathic overactive bladder .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Botulinum Toxin Type-A ( Dysport® ) Continent Female Subjects Suffering From Idiopathic Overactive Bladder
DOC.criteria: The subject diagnosis idiopathic overactive bladder , without incontinence . The subject ≥ 3 urgency episode course 3 day immediately precede Baseline visit . The subject ≥ 24 episode micturition course 3 day immediately precede Baseline visit . Bladder outlet obstruction ( urodynamic assessment ) . PostMicturition Residual Volume > 150 ml ( ultrasound assessment ) . Evidence urinary tract infection Screening Baseline study . Active history interstitial cystitis , malignancy bladder urothelial tract , carcinoma situ ( non malignant melanoma allow ) bladder and/or kidney stone .
